# SJAA Astronomical Auction

APRIL 17th, 1982

DON'T MISS IT! THOSE WHO ATTENDED LAST YEAR KNOW WHAT GOOD FUN AND GREAT BARGAINS ARE TO BE FOUND AT THE SJAA AUCTION!! ASTRONOMICAL GOODIES OF ALL TYPES...

articles.title: 1. The SJAA will receive 10% of the selling price on all items. You set the minimum bid. If a minimum bid is not received, the item will be returned to you unsold.

2. Total donation to the San Jose Astronomical Association. You set the minimum bid. (The SJAA is a non-profit organization. All monies collected from the auction go to support amateur and public astronomical activities.)
articles.summary:

articles.title: THE YOKE MOUNT
articles.summary:
For the observer who likes to "have his mount and
eat it, too". We suggest that, if at all possible, you
convince someone else to buy the egg for you—that
way, the yoke won't be on you.
